item.title: How do I put ip bann?
item.dc:creator: @D_D_3 D D 3
item.description:
@D_D_3 wrote:

Here and check your spelling please [quote=“Dead Man Hunter, post:3, topic:157798”]In client.java search for

        outStream.writeString("Trade with");

Make something close to that command but switch it with

        outStream.writeString("IP Ban");

Like this

Reg menu outStream.writeString("IP Ban"); outStream.endFrameVarSize(); appendToIPBanned; disconnection = true;

Something to that matter[/quote] From someone else not me.
